participant_1.background:
I order my food on the phone so that I can stay in my pajamas the whole time.
My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn about skiing and the mountains.
my favorite thing to do is float the river.
i am currently single.
I ride my bicycle every day to keep fit and to clear my head so I can focus on my writing.

participant_2.background:
I'm a cook who loves cooking seafood and dressing up for Halloween.
I'm a family person and I love to spend time with my kids.
pop is my favorite music.
I'm not good at keeping up with my family, but I always stay in touch with my dog.
i am not a nice person.

content.text: I love to cook, I am a cook at a local restaurant.
Oh that's awesome! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to cook seafood, especially lobster.
That sounds delicious! I'm more of a meat person myself.
I'm not a big fan of meat, but I love to cook it for my family.
That's nice of you! What are your kids' favorite things to eat?
They love anything I cook, but their favorite is probably my seafood pasta.
That sounds really good! I love pasta.
Me too! I eat it almost every day.
I wish I could eat pasta every day, but I have to watch my weight.
Yeah, I know what you mean. I try to stay in shape too, but it's hard when you love to cook food like I do.
I know what you mean! I'm always trying to find healthy recipes to cook.
Me too! I'm always looking for new recipes that are both healthy and delicious.
I think I'm going to try your seafood pasta recipe.
Great! Let me know how it turns out.
